General.Name: Pavlovskiy Avtobus OAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Pavlovo Bus produces and sells buses and special vehicles, automotive components, and spare parts in Russia. It also sells illiquid assets. The company was formerly known as Pavlovsky Avtobusny Zavod. The company was founded in 1932 and is based in Pavlovo, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Pavlovo Bus is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company GAZ.

3.Name: Mr. Aleksandr Nikolaevich Barlyaev
3.Title: Head of Legal Affairs & Property Management
